overview: A very influential ex-member of the Raëlian movement, Sylvie goes in search of answers to her many questions. How could she, a free and intelligent woman, have been caught up in this whirlwind of lies for so long? In her quest for truth, in the company of her accomplice Martine, also ex-Raëlian, she will scrutinize her sometimes painful memories in the hope of understanding what prompted her to remain in this movement for more than thirty years.
title: Les femmes de Raël
